'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 1''' is the first {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*01. Nico's Adventure Begins! (冒険家ニコの旅立ち!!, ''Bōken-ka Nico no Tabidachi!!'')
*02. A New Friend! (新たな仲間との出会い!!, ''Aratana Nakama no to Deai!!'')
*03. Desert Bandit Takedown! (砂漠の盗賊団をたおせ!!, ''Sabaku no Tōzoku-dan o Taose!!'')
*04. Trap Dungeon Escape! (トラップダンジョンを攻略せよ!!, ''Torappudanjon o Kōryaku Seyo!!'', lit. "Conquer the Trap Dungeon!!")
*05. The Twin-Blade Ninja's Challenge! (二刀流忍者の腕試し!!, ''Nitōryū Ninja no Udedameshi!!'')
